content.text: Hi, I'm [participant_1 name]!
Hi, I'm [participant_2 name]!
It's nice to meet you, [participant_1 name]. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to yoga classes, watch old movies, and travel.
That's cool! I like to go hiking, camping, and fishing.
Those sound like fun activities! I've never been camping, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's a great way to get outdoors and experience nature.
I'll have to give it a try sometime.
What's your favorite movie?
I have a lot of favorite movies, but one of my favorites is The Shawshank Redemption.
I love that movie! It's one of my favorites too.
It's so good! The acting is amazing, and the story is so powerful.
I agree! It's a classic movie that everyone should see.
I'm glad you like it! I've seen it so many times, and it never gets old.
I know what you mean! I've seen it too many times to count, and it always makes me feel good.
It's such a heartwarming movie.
It is! I love the characters and the message of the movie.
Me too! It's a great movie.
I'm glad you like it!
Thanks! It's one of my favorite movies.
